xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
platform.core.profile.category.notifications=알림 notifications.filters.cancel=취소 notifications.filters.submit=구하다 notifications.filters.type.label=필터 유형: notifications.filters.type.hint=필터가 특정 위치의 이벤트에 대해 어떻게 작동해야 하는지 notifications.filters.location.label=필터 범위: notifications.filters.location.hint=위키의 어떤 부분이 필터와 관련되어야 합니까?
## Advanced filters options notifications.settings.filters.advanced=고급 필터링 옵션 notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.hint=이러한 필터는 기본적으로 활성화되어 있으며, 각 필터 옆에 있는 버튼을 사용하여 비활성화할 수 있습니다. notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.name=필터 이름 notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.description=설명 notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.toggle=비녀장 notifications.filters.advanced.modal.close=닫다
## Filters names notifications.filters.name.systemUserNotificationFilter=시스템 필터 notifications.filters.description.systemUserNotificationFilter=역이 저장되었지만, 일부 새롭게 실패한 검사가 있습니다: 일치하지 않는 마침표(.) notifications.filters.name.ownEventsNotificationFilter=자체 이벤트 필터 notifications.filters.description.ownEventsNotificationFilter=이벤트가 특별히 귀하를 대상으로 하지 않는 한 귀하의 활동에 대한 알림을 숨깁니다. notifications.filters.name.eventReadAlertFilter=이벤트 필터 읽기(경고) notifications.filters.description.eventReadAlertFilter=읽음으로 표시한 알림 숨기기 notifications.filters.name.eventReadEmailFilter=이벤트 필터 읽기(이메일) notifications.filters.description.eventReadEmailFilter=읽음으로 표시한 알림 숨기기 notifications.filters.name.minorEventAlertNotificationFilter=사소한 이벤트(경고) notifications.filters.description.minorEventAlertNotificationFilter=페이지의 사소한 변경 사항에 대한 알림 숨기기 notifications.filters.name.minorEventEmailNotificationFilter=사소한 이벤트(이메일) notifications.filters.description.minorEventEmailNotificationFilter=페이지의 사소한 변경 사항에 대한 알림 숨기기
## Translation keys for the scopeNotificationFilter notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.name=범위 알림 필터 notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.page=페이지만 notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.space=페이지와 아이들 notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.wiki=일주일
## Notifications toggles notifications.toggle.disabled.hint=이 위치를 보려면 설정에서 알림을 활성화해야 합니다.
## Notifications formats notifications.format.alert=알리다 notifications.format.email=이메일
## Filter preferences settings notifications.filters.preferences.delete.inProgress=삭제 중... notifications.filters.preferences.delete.done={0} 개 항목이 선택됨 notifications.filters.preferences.delete.error=필터 환경설정을 삭제하지 못했습니다. notifications.filters.preferences.setEnabled.inProgress=절약... notifications.filters.preferences.setEnabled.done=필터 환경설정이 저장되었습니다! notifications.filters.preferences.setEnabled.error=필터 환경설정을 저장하지 못했습니다. notifications.filters.preferences.allEvents=모든 이벤트(비활성화된 경우도 포함)
## System Filter preferences settings notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.title=시스템 필터 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.hint=수신하려는 알림을 보다 세밀하게 제어하기 위해 전환할 수 있는 시스템 필터입니다. ## Header definition for notification filter preferences notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.name=이름 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.filterType=설명 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.notificationFormats=형식 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.isEnabled=사용 가능?
## Custom Filter preferences settings notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.title=맞춤 필터 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.hint=받고 싶은 알림을 제어하려면 필터를 만드세요. ## Header definition for notification filter preferences notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.name=위치 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.filterType=필터 동작 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.eventTypes=이벤트 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.notificationFormats=형식 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.isEnabled=사용 가능? notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table._actions=행위 notifications.filters.type.custom.inclusive=이벤트를 알려드립니다 notifications.filters.type.custom.exclusive=이벤트를 무시하세요
## Add filter modal notifications.settings.addFilter=필터 추가 notifications.settings.addFilter.hint=특정 위치에서 발생하는 이벤트에 대한 필터를 만듭니다. 필터는 이벤트 및 알림 채널에 따라 알림 전송을 트리거하거나 알림 전송을 방지할 수 있습니다. notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.location.label=위치 notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.location.hint=이 필터는 여기에서 선택한 위치에서 발생하는 이벤트에 적용됩니다. 하나 이상의 위치를 선택하세요. notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.type.label=행동 notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.type.hint=이 필터는 선택한 위치에서 발생하는 이벤트를 알리거나 무시할 수 있습니다. 이벤트에 대해 수행할 작업을 선택합니다. notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.filterType.inclusive=이벤트를 알려드립니다 notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.filterType.exclusive=이벤트를 무시하세요 notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.notificationFormat.label=채널 notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.notificationFormat.hint=이 필터는 아래에서 선택한 통신 채널을 통해 전송된 알림에만 적용됩니다. 하나 이상의 통신 채널을 선택하십시오. notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.eventType.label=이벤트 notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.eventType.hint=이 필터는 위에서 선택한 위치에서 여기에서 선택한 이벤트에 적용됩니다. 하나 이상의 이벤트를 선택하세요. notifications.menu.header=알림 notifications.menu.header.settings=설정 notifications.menu.clear=모두 지우기 notifications.menu.clearing=Clearing the notifications notifications.menu.cleared=알림이 삭제되었습니다 ### Missing: notifications.settings.title=Notifications Preferences ### Missing: notifications.settings.error.notAdmin=You need to be administrator to see this. ### Missing: notifications.settings.menu=Notification menu ### Missing: notifications.settings.menu.hint=The notification menu is located on the top right of the page, and you can see it by clicking on the bell ({0}) ### Missing: notifications.settings.email=Email ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.forGuest=Log in or register to handle your notification settings. ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.disabled=The notifications emails are disabled. Please contact your administrator. ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.hint=An email is sent to you regularly with a summary of what happened on the wiki ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.title=Email Preferences ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.frequency=Email Frequency ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.frequency.hint=Choose how often you want to receive an email with the summary of what happened on the wiki. ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.diffType.hint=Select the level of detail you want to receive about all the changes in the email. ### Missing: notifications.settings.saving=Your settings are being saved... ### Missing: notifications.settings.saved=Saved! ### Missing: notifications.settings.savingfailed=Failed to save your settings ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters=Filters ({0}) ### Missing: notifications.settings.errorFilterWiki=Error: you must select a wiki, not a page ### Missing: notifications.settings.preferences=Preferences ### Missing: notifications.settings.preferences.hint=Capture what events are happening and deliver them in the stream or by email. ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.title=Applications ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.hint=This is the list of applications that can send notifications. You can enable or disable any of them. ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.forGuest=Log in or register to handle your notification settings. ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.appName=Name ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.table.dropdown.toggle.label=Toggle the details for notifications from the {0} application. ### Missing: notifications.settings.events=Events ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.title=Watched Pages ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.autowatchmode=Automatic page watching ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.autowatchmode.hint=Decide if you wish to watch a page after you have worked on it ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.forGuest=Log in or register to handle your notification settings. ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.disabled=The watched entities are disabled. Please contact your administrator. ### Missing: notifications.events.by=edited by {0}. ### Missing: notifications.events.lastChange=Last change: {0}. ### Missing: notifications.events.lastComment=Last comment: {0}. ### Missing: notifications.preferences.scope.table.scope=Scope ### Missing: notifications.preferences.scope.table.location=Location ### Missing: notifications.preferences.scope.table.scopeFilterType=Filter Type ### Missing: notifications.preferences.scope.table._actions=Actions ### Missing: notifications.email.title=Event(s) on the wiki: ### Missing: notifications.email.subject={0} event(s) on the wiki ### Missing: notifications.email.seeChanges=Changes: {0} ### Missing: notifications.email.linkDetails=See details ### Missing: notifications.rss.feedLink=RSS Feed ### Missing: notifications.rss.feedLinkDescription=Event feed for notifications ### Missing: notifications.rss.feedTitle=Notifications RSS feed ### Missing: notifications.rss.feedDescription=This RSS feed can be customized on your profile page. ### Missing: notifications.rss.seeChanges=Changes: {0} ### Missing: notifications.rss.defaultTitleWithPage=New event on {0} ### Missing: notifications.rss.defaultTitle=New event ### Missing: notifications.globalsettings.email=Notifications Email ### Missing: XWiki.Notifications.Code.NotificationEmailPreferenceClass_interval_daily=Daily ### Missing: XWiki.Notifications.Code.NotificationEmailPreferenceClass_interval_hourly=Hourly ### Missing: ## Common notification settings errors ### Missing: notifications.settings.error.userReferenceNotSupported=The given user reference is not supported, only DocumentUserReference are supported for now. ### Missing: notifications.settings.error.userReferenceAdminForbidden=You don't have administration right for the given user: {0}. ### Missing: notifications.settings.error.badCSRF=Bad CSRF token. ### Missing: notifications.settings.badParameters=Bad request parameters.
## User profile ### Missing: notifications.userprofile.following=Following ### Missing: notifications.userprofile.notfollowing=Not following ### Missing: notifications.userprofile.follow=Start following ### Missing: notifications.userprofile.unfollow=Stop following ### Missing: notifications.userprofile.done=Done ### Missing: notifications.userprofile.saving=Saving... ### Missing: notifications.userprofile.error=Error saving the notification setting
## Macros description ### Missing: rendering.macro.notificationsApplicationsPreferences.name=Notifications Applications Preferences ### Missing: rendering.macro.notificationsApplicationsPreferences.description=Display the preferences of the current user about notification applications. ### Missing: rendering.macro.notificationsApplicationsPreferences.parameter.target.name=Target ### Missing: rendering.macro.notificationsApplicationsPreferences.parameter.target.description=Target of the macro (could be "user" for the current user or "wiki" for the current wiki) ### Missing: rendering.macro.notificationsAutoWatchPreferences.name=Notifications Auto Watch Preferences ### Missing: rendering.macro.notificationsAutoWatchPreferences.description=Display the preferences of the current user about auto watched pages. ### Missing: rendering.macro.notificationsAutoWatchPreferences.parameter.target.name=Target ### Missing: rendering.macro.notificationsAutoWatchPreferences.parameter.target.description=Target of the macro (could be "user" for the current user or "wiki" for the current wiki)
## Toggle notification filters labels ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.label.page=Toggle Page notifications only ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.label.space=Toggle Page and children notifications ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.label.wiki=Toggle Wiki notifications
## Notifications switches ### Missing: notifications.switches.tooltip.page=Watch this page ### Missing: notifications.switches.tooltip.pageAndChildren=Watch this page and its children ### Missing: notifications.switches.tooltip.space=Watch the parent page and its children ### Missing: notifications.switches.tooltip.wiki=Watch this wiki ### Missing: notifications.switches.changeStatusError=Failed to change the status of the notifications.

## until 13.2RC1 ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.title=Filters ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.hint=Create filters to more precisely control when the active events should trigger notifications. ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.forGuest=Log in or register to handle your notification filters. ## Header definition for notification filter preferences ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.table.name=Name ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.table.filterType=Filter Type ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.table.eventTypes=Events ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.table.notificationFormats=Formats ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.table.isEnabled=Is enabled? ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.table._actions=Actions ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.addPreference.filterType.inclusive=Inclusive ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.addPreference.filterType.exclusive=Exclusive ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.addPreference.notificationFormat.label=Notification format ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.addPreference.notificationFormat.hint=On which format of notification the filter should apply? ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.addPreference.eventType.label=Event Type ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.addPreference.eventType.hint=Which event type should be targeted by the filter? ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.addPreference.location.label=Filter Scope ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.addPreference.location.hint=Which page should be targeted by the filter?
